name: Servant of Greed
description:
Decription

As a fanatic servant, you must gather treasures for your dear god.

Info

Hello strangers!

This is our first time entering LudumDare and it is our first time creating a game ever! The programming was done by me (Mikael) and the art was created by Katarina. Since we felt that our first game should be extra special, we also decided to make all of the sound effects and music ourselves.

Oh, and we added gamepad support. I think...

Current high score to beat is: 483!

Hope you enjoy!
